Pontypool
Party In
The Park

PONTYPOOL PARK | Saturday 12th July | FREE ADMISSION

What's On Register Contact

Come to our annual summer party that just got a whole lot BIGGER!

Pontypool Party in the Park is the summer's hottest ticket! Join us for a day of fantastic live music across multiple stages, delicious food from local vendors, and fun for the whole family. Kids' activities, market stalls, and a vibrant atmosphere guarantee a memorable day.

All included with Free Admission!

Entertainment

Amazing live music from local favourites to big-name headliners across our multiple stages. Get ready to dance the day away!

Explore our Entertainment

Food & Drink

Savour street food delights and refreshing drinks! From succulent gourmet burgers to tasty treats, we've got you covered!

Explore our Food & Drink

Gifts & Stalls

Discover unique gifts and toys at our vibrant market stalls. Browse handcrafted treasures and perfect presents for all ages.

Explore our Gifts & Stalls

Facilities

Clean, accessible toilets and handwashing facilities available throughout the event. First aid on site for your peace of mind.

Explore our Facilities

Social Media

Follow us on Social Media for all the latest news and updates!

 ENTERTAINMENT

Get ready for a sonic explosion! Experience an incredible lineup of live music across multiple stages. From exciting local bands to chart-topping headliners, there's something for everyone. Discover new favourites, sing along to anthems, and create unforgettable memories. Prepare for a day of non-stop musical entertainment!

With Performances By...

GLC

Newport's finest, Goldie Lookin Chain, are back! Original gangsters of Welsh hip-hop, expect hilarious rhymes, massive beats, and pure gold.

Stereophonics

Welsh rockers Stereophonics deliver anthemic indie rock. Distinctive vocals and powerful riffs have made them a stadium-filling favourite.

Cerys Matthews

From Catatonia's fiery frontwoman to solo star, Cerys Matthews' eclectic and captivating presence blend folk and indie influences.

Ruth Jones

Ruth Jones: Soulful Welsh singer-songwriter. Her warm and honest lyrics tell stories of life, love, and laughter. A voice that resonates.

 Food & Drink

Foodies rejoice! A delicious array of street food stalls will be serving up tasty treats. From gourmet burgers and wood-fired pizzas to vegan delights and sweet treats, there's something to satisfy every craving. Licensed bars will also be available!

Ponty Pies: A local legend, baking fresh pies daily. From classic steak and ale to our famous creamy chicken, there's a Ponty Pie for everyone. Savour the fantastic flavour,experience the tradition and get stuck in!

  • * Made with fresh, local ingredients.
  • * Pies that taste homemade.
  • * Sweet and savory pies available.

  • * Plump, juicy patties for maximum flavor.
  • * Build your dream burger!
  • * Try our mystery special sauce.

Cheers Beers: Discover your new favourite craft beer! We sell a diverse range of continental beers bursting with flavour, from hoppy IPAs and rich stouts to crisp lagers and fruity ales. Cheers to good times!

  • * Fresh selection of craft beers on draft.
  • * Showcasing the best brews in Europe.
  • * Experts ready to serve your perfect pint.

Facilities

Your health and hygiene are our priority at Pontypool Party in the Park! We've got dedicated on-site medical professionals, comprehensive first aid services, and accessible toilets with handwashing facilities. Enjoy the party knowing we've got you covered!

Toilets

Enjoy clean, accessible toilets conveniently located throughout the park. We've got ample facilities to ensure your comfort all day long!

Medical

Dedicated medical professionals and comprehensive first aid services are available on-site, ensuring prompt assistance if required.

Rest & Relax

Recharge in our designated rest areas. We've provided some comfortable spaces for you to enjoy the event at your own pace.

Meeting Point

Lost or separated? Our clearly marked meeting point provides a great central hub for reuniting with your friends and family.

Registration

Don't miss out on Pontypool Party in the Park! Register now via our online form for updates, exclusive offers, and a chance to win prizes.

Travel

Getting to Pontypool Party in the Park is easy!

Public transport options include local buses serving the surrounding area and Pontypool train station, with regular services running throughout the day. Plan your journey in advance for a smooth arrival!

By Car

Simply hop in your car and enjoy a scenic drive. Whether you're coming from the north or south, major routes lead directly to Pontypool.

Plan your perfect journey using the Google Maps link below

Route Plan with Google Maps

By Bus

Regular bus services run directly to Pontypool town centre, with stops conveniently located near The Park.

Plan your journey using the Stagecoach Bus Journey Planner link below

Route Plan with Stagecoach Torfaen

By Train

Catching the train is a fantastic way to reach the festivities. Pontypool and New Inn station is conveniently located, with regular services connecting to major towns and cities.

Plan your journey using the Trainline Journey Planner link below

Route Plan with The Trainline

FAQs

Pontypool Party in The Park is committed to accessibility for all.

Designated accessible parking is available close to the event entrance, with step-free access throughout the park. Accessible toilets, including changing places facilities, are provided.

Clear, easy-to-read signage is displayed across the site. Assistance dogs are welcome and water bowls are available. We offer a limited number of wheelchairs for hire; please book in advance.

For any specific accessibility needs or to request assistance, please contact us in advance so our team can best assist you and ensure a comfortable and enjoyable experience for everyone.

Pontypool Party in The Park is a welcoming and inclusive event for everyone.

We celebrate diversity and believe everyone should feel safe and respected. We strive to create a space free from discrimination where all can enjoy the festivities. We encourage attendees to express themselves authentically and celebrate their identities.

We are committed to fostering a supportive environment and will not tolerate any form of harassment or prejudice. Our team is trained to be aware of inclusivity issues, and we encourage anyone experiencing problems to report them to event staff.

We believe Pontypool Party in the Park should be a joyous occasion for all, and we're committed to making it a truly inclusive experience for our diverse community. If you have any questions or concerns, please get in touch.

Pontypool Party in the Park aims to be welcoming and accessible to neurodivergent individuals and their families.

We offer a designated quiet zone with seating, providing a calmer environment away from the main stage and crowds. Sensory aids, such as earplugs, will be available at the information tent.

We encourage attendees to bring their own sensory supports.

We welcome feedback on how we can improve accessibility for neurodivergent individuals. For any specific requests or questions, please contact us in advance.

Pontypool Party in the Park is a family-friendly event with lots to offer children of all ages!

A secure, enclosed play area is available for toddlers. Designated baby changing facilities are provided. Our friendly event staff will be on hand to assist families.

We encourage parents to supervise their children at all times.

For any questions or assistance during the event, please visit the information tent or speak to a member of staff. We look forward to seeing you and your little ones at The Park!

Pontypool Party in the Park is committed to supporting vital local causes.

We believe in giving back to our community and are offering several ways for attendees to contribute. Look for our designated charity information booths to learn about the organizations we're partnering with this year and discover the important work they do.

Participate in our fundraising initiatives! A portion of the proceeds from select activities will go directly to supporting local causes. Donation points will also be conveniently located throughout the park for your contributions.

Every little bit helps make a big difference. Join us in making Pontypool Party in the Park a celebration that gives back to the community we love!

Pontypool Party in the Park offers exciting sponsorship opportunities for businesses of all sizes.

Partner with us and gain valuable exposure to a large and engaged audience. Sponsorship packages can be tailored to meet your specific marketing objectives and budget.

Benefits include prominent logo placement on event signage, website, and promotional materials, as well as opportunities for on-site activation and engagement with attendees. Align your brand with a beloved community event and demonstrate your commitment to Pontypool.

Contact us today to discuss sponsorship options and secure your place at this year's Party in the Park.

Contact Us

Have a question about Pontypool Party in the Park? Get in touch - our friendly team is happy to help with any queries you may have, we'd love to hear from you!

Social Media

Stay connected with Pontypool Party in the Park! Follow us on social media for exclusive updates, behind-the-scenes glimpses, and exciting announcements. Join the conversation!
